content: center ice mitts by njeri sims this pattern was written for any big time hockey fan i got very sick of making mods to 220 fingerless mitt s by jessica jensen on ravelry that i just decided to write up my own version just for all the hockey fans out there because of the 2 x 1 ribbing they will fit a wide range of people finished hand circumference at the widest part of your hand unstretched 3 inches 3 25 inches mitts will grow a bit with wear yarn berroco comfort solids & heathers worsted / 10 ply 50% acrylic 50% nylon 210 yards 192 0 metters / 100 grams 1 skein in each of your favorite teams color see below key and jersey for each teams color number in this yarn needles 1 24 /60cm or longer us 5/3 75mm circular needle for average women s size 1 24 /60cm or longer us 7/4 5mm circular needle for average men s size or size to obtain gauge gauge for women s size 34 stitches x 36 row = 4 /10cm worked in 2x1 rib unstretched on size us 5/3 75mm needles 24 stitches x 36 row = 4 /10cm worked in stockinette stitch on size us 5/3 75mm needles gauge for men s size 28 stitches x 32 row = 4 /10cm worked in 2x1 rib unstretched on size us 7/4 5mm needles 20 stitches x 32 row = 4 /10cm worked in stockinette stitch on size us 7/4 5mm needles other tools needed 3 stitch markers waste yarn or stitch holders tapestry/darning needle 1 | p age key knit k purl p co cast on sm slip marker
